hotels.title: Chic Charlottesville Retreat near Downtown Mall with Two Pools & Onsite Restaurant
hotels.description: Experience the vibrant heart of Charlottesville with a sumptuous stay at this refined hotel. Situated in the historic downtown district, find yourself just moments from the Downtown Mall, a pedestrian-friendly hub filled with shops, restaurants and entertainment venues. Savour local flavours at the onsite Hillock Neighbourhood Kitchen and unwind with innovative cocktails at The Conservatory. For history buffs, Monticello, the home of Thomas Jefferson, is only a short drive away. After a day of exploration, return to the comfort of your hotel's well-appointed rooms and cool off with a refreshing dip in the indoor or outdoor pool.
